originalText.text: I saw Christina for a one-off session. I was having chronic pain in my quads while running and walking, and in one session Christina did some fascial massage and a thorough gait analysis. Following her corrections to my walking and running gait over the next few weeks eliminated 97% of my symptoms! She was great over the phone and email, very responsive and clear, and it was easy to find an appointment time that worked.

text.text: I saw Christina for a one-off session. I was having chronic pain in my quads while running and walking, and in one session Christina did some fascial massage and a thorough gait analysis. Following her corrections to my walking and running gait over the next few weeks eliminated 97% of my symptoms! originalText.text: It’s been my pleasure to work with Christina for over a year now. She is friendly, knowledgeable and thorough. She is flexible in her approach and happy to work with varying schedules. Her background in dance gives her a unique insight into how bodies work and she is devoted to helping them work better. A+!

text.text: It’s been my pleasure to work with Christina for over a year now. She is friendly, knowledgeable and thorough. She is flexible in her approach and happy to work with varying schedules. Her background in dance gives her a unique insight into how bodies work and she is devoted to helping them work better. A+!

originalText.text: Christina Richards is the absolutely the most effective body worker I've met in 40 years.  A gentle and disciplined Rolfer, Christina brings her background as a dancer, a pilates instructor, a massage therapist to help you achieve a more balanced way of moving and a body that is flexible and pain free.  I am so grateful to Christina.

originalText.text: The therapy was delivered with compassion, and skill.  looking forwrd to more sessions.
